title: Protest in Kuwait Against Putin Shared as Anti-Modi Demonstration
subtitle: Fact Check of Protest Against Modi: An image circulating on social media falsely claims that people in Saudi Arabia held a demonstration against Prime Minister Narendra Modi by raising shoes to protest against alleged atrocities on Indian muslims.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
An image circulating on social media claims that people in Saudi Arabia held a demonstration against Prime Minister Narendra Modi, where they raised shoes to protest against the alleged atrocities on Indian Muslims.

The claim along with the image reads: “सऊदी अरब में मोदी के खिलाफ जूते चप्पल के साथ सड़कों पर उतरे लोग हिंदुस्तान के मुस्लिमों के साथ हो रहे अत्त्याचार ओर 3 तलाक़ के बहाने शरीयत के साथ छेड़छाड़ की कोशिश के विरोध में मोदी के पोस्टर को दिखाए जूते चप्पल”
